name: Neolithic First City-States
summary: Neolithic: First City-States is a Historical Strategy Game. Though Neolithic doesn't fall easily into popular strategy genres, the game is heavily influenced by games such as Age of Empires, Civilization, Caesar III, and to a lesser extent games like RimWorld. The game includes aspects of City-Building, RTS-like gameplay and deeper characters. It is essentially a full-time solo dev project.
